item.title: About Me
item.description:
By day I work at Disney doing Runbook Automation in Seatte, WA.

By night I play with electronics and whatever silly programming hobbies I can get into.

With the rest of my free time I like to go on adventures, train parkour, and spend time with my lovely wife.

I have a Master’s of Science in Electrical Engineering from the University of North Carolina at Charlotte.

Professionally I enjoy backend system design and programming focused on highly available, distributed systems. I have extensice experience working in Go, Python, C, and C++.
